metadata.Title: CVE-2021-2385 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:Server: Replication). Supported versions that are affected are 5.7.34 andprior and 8.0.25 and prior. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows highprivileged attacker with network access via multiple protocols tocompromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability canresult in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatablecrash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server as well as unauthorized update, insertor delete access to some of MySQL Server accessible data. CVSS 3.1 BaseScore 5.0 (Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:H/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:H).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-2385` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysqlclient20 - 5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-client - 5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-client-5.7 - 5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-client-core-5.7 - 5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-common - 5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-server - 5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-server-5.7 - 5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-server-core-5.7 - 5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-source-5.7 - 5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-testsuite - 5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-testsuite-5.7 - 5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mysql-5.7 package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1').
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
percona-server-5.6 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
